title: Creating a ranked team, Gold 5+ need ADC, TOP, JG
body:
Okay, so answer me a few questions, add me on the league client, and I will be holding team trials, to see who works well with the members who we already have.
I don't want to close off any options, gold 5 and up only please, I'm gold 3, our mid laner is gold 5, but plays at a platinum level.

IGN:
Role:
Rank:
Main Champions:
How long have you played:
What specific skills can you offer to our team?
What are your strengths and weaknesses when it comes to playing a game of LoL?
Can you take constructive criticism well and learn from it?
Finally, are you available at least 4 nights a week and which nights?

replies.body:
our mid laner is gold 5, but plays at a platinum level
how is that so if he's in gold v

Do you want to be on our team? If not then please keep your "child"ish comments to yourself. I'm only interested in people who are applying to be on our team not people who just came to snoop around and act like they are superior to everyone else. You're in diamond, good for you, my mid laner is very good for his level, he wins lane nearly every time, and we have played against platinum mid laners and he has won against them. I would consider his lane mechanics platinum level.

If you're only interested in people who are applying then why bother replying to me? That just completely contradicts with what you've said. In no shape or form did I act like I was superior to everyone else, I did not flaunt my rank (which is in no way good at all) but you point out the obvious so I question the obvious; as to why you think a Gold V (yes Gold V) plays at a platinum level. That is indeed wrong, he plays at a gold level. 
"Lane mechanics platinum level" seems awfully naive since the aim of the game is not to even win your lane, but to win the game. Nevertheless, winning your lane against a platinum player in normals does not even constitute his skill; it's normals for pete's sake LOL
It's good you have faith in your mid laner but to brag and flaunt about his skill being higher than he is is just ridiculous. I've beaten diamond III mid laners, does that mean I'm diamond III level as well although I've been stuck in Diamond V?

IGN: Spaghini
Role: Top
Rank: Gold 5
Main Champions: Riven, Trundle, Shen, Maokai, Poppy (^_^)
How long have you played: About 2 years of ranked play
What specific skills can you offer to our team? Usually win or draw lane, farm well for my elo, and bring a positive attitude :)
What are your strengths and weaknesses when it comes to playing a game of LoL? Lane well and work well with teammates i know, although i sometimes tilt and play badly once i get behind. No voice comms :(
Can you take constructive criticism well and learn from it? YES PLEASE
Finally, are you available at least 4 nights a week and which nights? Pretty much every night i expect.

Hey im Frost09, I couldn't help notice your top lane champion pool and was wondering if this team doesn't work out if you want to join our team 

 http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/MIAPlElt-looking-for-goldplat-players-from-season-4-and-willing-to-start-a-semi-serious-ranked-team?sort_type=recent

IGN: Langazz
Role: ADC (can support as well)
Rank: Plat 4
Main Champions: Graves, corki, jinx, sivir, cait, trist
How long have you played: 1yearr of ranked play
What specific skills can you offer to our team? Good communication and not toxic
What are your strengths and weaknesses when it comes to playing a game of LoL? strength: mechanics , weaknesses: shot-calling. 
Can you take constructive criticism well and learn from it? yes
Finally, are you available at least 4 nights a week and which nights? I'm available around 6 nights out of the week

You should be apart of our team if you don't fit here we have a great spot for as ADC/support we have great players as well a couple in 3 gold players and 4 plat players 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/MIAPlElt-looking-for-goldplat-players-from-season-4-and-willing-to-start-a-semi-serious-ranked-team?sort_type=recent

IGN: YueyangXiaoyyx
Role: AD Marksman Main but play all other roles.
Rank: Gold 5 (peaked Gold 2)
Main Champions: Vayne/Lucian/J4
How long have you played: I have played on and off since open beta, I have Quit many time in-between but have been playing a lot since season 3. I peaked Plat 4 on NA and Gold 2 on OCE.
What specific skill can you offer to our team: I am a all-rounder player I guess and I have been told I play extremely aggressively which in some cases is very rewarding but I really play from that.
What are your strengths and weaknesses when it comes to playing a game of LOL: I am good mechanical but am not the best decision maker, I may not be the best player in every game but I coop with team well.
Can you take constructive criticism well and learn form it: Yes, I like it when people tell me what I am doing wrong and it helps me improve, tell me is a lot better then not because I take comments from my team seriously. 
Are you available at least 4 nights a week and which nights: For now everyday and night, but will change to Friday, Saturday, Sunday, Tuesday.

> [{quoted}](name=CandySlay3r,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gnc3FLv0,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-12T09:23:39.882+0000)
>
> Okay, so answer me a few questions, add me on the league client, and I will be holding team trials, to see who works well with the members who we already have.
> I don't want to close off any options, gold 5 and up only please, I'm gold 3, our mid laner is gold 5, but plays at a platinum level.
> 
> IGN: Jigokusai
> Role: Jungle/Adc/Support
> Rank: Gold 5, decayed from gold 2 
> Main Champions: j4/Ezreal/Thresh
> How long have you played: Since beta, got 4 gold 5 accounts, 3 silver smurfs >>>
> What specific skills can you offer to our team?: Dragon control, rotations, ranked team exp
> What are your strengths and weaknesses when it comes to playing a game of LoL?: Good communication, sometimes a little to aggresive
> Can you take constructive criticism well and learn from it?: Yes!
> Finally, are you available at least 4 nights a week and which nights?: Yeah, all nights atm as am unemployed = free time
